definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: As we found few dimmers with loose wires.
sentences.chinese: 当我们用宽松的电线发现少数调光器。

sentences.english: The invention provides an electronic light modulator for an energy-saving lamp.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供了一种用于节能灯的电子调光器。

sentences.english: Constant current regulator (CCR) is to provide visual guidance for aircraft taking off and landing.
sentences.chinese: 恒流调光器是为飞机起降提供目视引导的关键设备。

sentences.english: The main part of the object were the crossed fluorescent tubes which were controlled by a dimmer.
sentences.chinese: 该物品的主要部分是由调光器控制的交叉荧光管。

sentences.english: Automatic dimmers can reduce the intensity of interior lighting when sunlight is bright.
sentences.chinese: 自动调光器在阳光明亮时可降低室内照明强度。

sentences.english: The total digital control of the light dimmer in the airfield is based on DSP.
sentences.chinese: 机场助航灯调光器的全数字控制采用DSP实现。

definition: electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
